title: KubeCon 24: Crossplane, a Developer-Friendly Control Plane
author: Joab Jackson
description: Those heading to KubeCon+CloudNativeCon Europe later this month should stop by the Crossplane booth to learn about the latest release of this cloud-native control plane.
cntitle: KubeCon 24：Crossplane，一款对开发者友好的控制平面
cndescription: 本月晚些时候前往 KubeCon+CloudNativeCon Europe 的人应在 Crossplane 展位停留，了解此云原生控制平面的最新版本。
